questions.text: How do I create an account?
What features does your platform offer?

q1.answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner of our homepage. You'll need to provide an email address and create a password.

questions.text: Can I use social media to sign up?

q2.answer: Our platform offers project management, time tracking, team collaboration, file sharing, and reporting features.

questions.text: Tell me more about project management
How does the time tracking work?

q3.answer: We offer three pricing tiers: Basic ($10/month), Pro ($25/month), and Enterprise ($50/month per user).

questions.text: What's included in the Enterprise plan?

q4.answer: Yes, we send a verification email to confirm your account. Simply click the link in the email to complete verification.

questions.text: What if I don't receive the verification email?

q5.answer: Yes, you can sign up using your Google, Facebook, or Twitter account for quicker registration.

questions.text: Is it secure to use social login?

q6.answer: Our project management features include task boards, Gantt charts, deadlines and milestones, task assignments, and progress tracking.

questions.text: Can I customize the project views?

q7.answer: Time tracking allows you to log hours spent on tasks. You can track manually or use our timer feature, and generate reports for billing.

questions.text: Can time tracking be integrated with invoicing?

q8.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial on all plans with no credit card required.

questions.text: What happens after the trial ends?

q9.answer: The Enterprise plan includes everything in Pro, plus dedicated support, custom integrations, advanced security, and unlimited storage.

questions.text: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?

q10.answer: If you don't receive the email within 5 minutes, please check your spam folder or request a new verification email from your account settings.

q11.answer: Yes, social login is secure. We only receive basic profile information and never post to your accounts without permission.

q12.answer: Absolutely! You can customize views, fields, and workflows to match your team's specific processes.

q13.answer: Yes, time tracking data can be exported or directly integrated with our invoicing feature in the Pro and Enterprise plans.

q14.answer: After the trial ends, you'll be prompted to select a plan. Your data remains saved for 30 days even if you don't subscribe immediately.

q15.answer: Yes, we offer a 25% discount for verified non-profit organizations. Contact our sales team for details.
